description: The file is an HTML document that constructs a web-based user interface for visualizing database contents, including databases, tables, and data rows. It contains inline CSS for styling and embedded JavaScript handling data fetching, user interactions, and dynamic content rendering.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the server and populates the sidebar with database items.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resets current selections, and updates the UI accordingly.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the database item to show or hide its tables, and loads the tables dynamically.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a selected database and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads data rows for a selected table and renders them in a table format, handling empty state or errors.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs an HTML table from data rows and inserts it into the container.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual table cell content based on data type, handling objects, long strings, or nulls.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses a cell to show full content or truncate it, including JSON objects.
